statements: SELECT * FROM remote_team_communication;
SELECT id, sender_id, timestamp FROM remote_team_communication WHERE sender_id = 123;
SELECT message FROM remote_team_communication WHERE receiver_id = 456 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM remote_team_communication WHERE receiver_id = 789;
SELECT * FROM remote_team_communication ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM remote_team_communication WHERE sender_id = 5 AND receiver_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) FROM remote_team_communication GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT sender_id, receiver_id FROM remote_team_communication WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY sender_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM remote_team_communication WHERE message LIKE '%urgent%' AND receiver_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM remote_team_communication GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_communication;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, timestamp FROM team_communication ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT collaboration_id, project_id, collaboration_type FROM team_collaboration WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM team_collaboration WHERE collaboration_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT team_id, project_id FROM team_collaboration ORDER BY team_id, project_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_communication WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message_text, sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM team_communication WHERE receiver_id = 2;
SELECT collaboration_type, collaboration_description, collaboration_timestamp FROM team_collaboration WHERE team_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM team_communication WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-01-31';
SELECT sender_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM team_communication GROUP BY sender_id ORDER BY message_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT collaboration_name, participants, start_date FROM collaborations WHERE collaboration_type = 'Project' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Developer';
SELECT message_text, timestamp FROM messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT collaboration_name, collaboration_type, start_date FROM collaborations WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT member_name, member_role FROM team_members WHERE member_role = 'Manager' ORDER BY member_name ASC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM messages GROUP BY sender_id, receiver_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, position FROM team_members WHERE department='IT';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM communication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT collab_id, project_id, team_member_id, collaboration_type FROM collaboration_history ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT log_id, sender_id, receiver_id, message, timestamp FROM communication_logs WHERE log_id = 1;
SELECT name, position, department FROM team_members WHERE member_id = 5;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM team_projects WHERE project_id = 10;
SELECT collab_id, project_id, team_member_id, collaboration_type, timestamp FROM collaboration_history WHERE collab_id = 20;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs JOIN team_members ON communication_logs.sender_id = team_members.member_id;
SELECT * FROM team_members;
SELECT name, role FROM team_members WHERE id = 1;
SELECT message_id, message_text, timestamp FROM team_messages ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_name, topic FROM team_channels WHERE length(topic) > 50;
SELECT meeting_date, duration, agenda FROM team_meetings WHERE duration > '01:00:00';
SELECT * FROM team_members WHERE role = 'Developer';
SELECT message_text FROM team_messages WHERE receiver_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT channel_name, topic FROM team_channels WHERE topic IS NOT NULL AND channel_name LIKE '%project%';
SELECT file_name, upload_date FROM team_files WHERE file_size > 1000 ORDER BY upload_date ASC;
SELECT meeting_date, duration, agenda FROM team_meetings WHERE duration > '01:00:00';
